definition: woven mat/seat/banquet/place in a democratic assembly/classifier for banquets, conversations etc

sentences.english: They entered the rear day coach and sat down.
sentences.chinese: 他們上了後面的一輛硬席客車。

definition: soft seat (= first class in PRC trains)
soft sleeper (a type of sleeper train ticket class with a softer bunk)
hard sleeper (a type of sleeper train ticket class with a harder bunk)
green train (slow, noisy, unairconditioned train with forest green livery and yellow trim that ran on the Chinese railway system from the 1950s, phased out in the early 21st century)
train or coach service ("service" as in "they run 12 services per day between the two cities")
power car/multiple-unit train (abbr. for 動車組|动车组)
to buy or upgrade a ticket after boarding a train, boat etc/to buy a ticket for a show after having sat down in the theater
